title: Monetization & Premium Experience
description: Introduced the SafeScore Pro tier with crypto payment integration and a subscription-based access model.

changes.title: Coinbase Commerce Integration
changes.description: Added global crypto payment support (BTC, ETH, SOL, USDC) via Coinbase Commerce with blockchain verification.

changes.title: Pro & Free Plan Gating
changes.description: Implemented tiered access. Free users get limited daily predictions, while Pro users unlock unlimited matches, future dates (Tomorrow/Weekend), and deeper AI analysis.

changes.title: Automated Subscription Lifecycle
changes.description: Developed a 30-day access model for crypto payments. Pro status is automatically granted upon confirmation and gracefully expires precisely after one month.

changes.title: Premium Dashboard UI/UX
changes.description: Refined the dashboard with a 'Pro Active' status badge, live countdown timer for subscription days remaining, and new success notifications.

changes.title: Global Support Infrastructure
changes.description: Added direct support integration via email and updated the landing page footer with professional contact channels.

changes.title: Simplified USD Pricing
changes.description: Standardized pricing to a global USD $3.45/month rate to ensure consistency across international crypto markets.

changes.title: Landing Page UI Enhancement
changes.description: Redesigned the landing page with glassmorphism effects, improved navigation consistency, and a more cohesive aesthetic across all components (Hero, Features, Testimonials).

title: Open Source Release
description: SafeScore is now open source at the platform level. We've decoupled the architecture so the frontend and developer experience are open for collaboration, while the core prediction engine remains private.

changes.title: Open Source Release
changes.description: Released the full frontend and proxy layer under the MIT License. Contributions are now welcome!

changes.title: Contribution Page
changes.description: Added a new dedicated page for community members to find out how to contribute, join discussions, and report issues.

changes.title: Supabase Cloud Persistence
changes.description: Migrated historical tracking from local JSON to Supabase. This ensures prediction history remains persistent even on serverless platforms like Vercel.

changes.title: Automated Quality Checks
changes.description: Implemented GitHub Actions (CI) to ensure code quality and stability for all future contributions.

changes.title: Improved Security
changes.description: Enhanced environment variable handling and deployment rules to protect core engine keys in a public environment.

changes.title: Branding & Navigation Update
changes.description: Rebranded 'History' to 'Previous Matches' for better clarity. Upgraded the Navbar with a full-screen mobile menu and improved z-index layering.

changes.title: Prediction History Grouping
changes.description: Fixed a bug where predictions for 'weekend' or 'future' dates were mistakenly saved under the current date. They are now correctly grouped by their actual match dates.

changes.title: Responsive UI Fixes
changes.description: Fixed layout issues in the community section and improved button responsiveness across various screen sizes.

title: Transparency & AI Verification
description: A major update focused on trust, transparency, and clearer confidence signaling for predictions.

changes.title: Prediction History & Performance Tracking
changes.description: Added a history page that displays past predictions, outcomes, and accuracy metrics, allowing users to review how SafeScore performs over time.

changes.title: Gemini AI Verification (Top 10 Matches)
changes.description: Integrated Gemini 2.5 Flash to verify the top 10 highest-confidence predicted matches. Verified matches are clearly marked with an AI badge in the UI.

changes.title: AI Verification Badge
changes.description: Introduced a visual AI badge on prediction cards to indicate matches that have passed secondary verification by Gemini.

changes.title: Wall of Love
changes.description: Added a community feedback section showcasing real comments and reactions from early users testing SafeScore.

changes.title: Confidence-Based Highlighting
changes.description: Improved how high-confidence predictions are surfaced, making it easier to identify safer picks at a glance.

changes.title: AI Qualitative Reasoning (Top 10)
changes.description: For our Top 10 picks, the AI now provides professional analysis (e.g., injuries, tactics) that explains why a match was verified. This reasoning is saved to history for future review.

title: The Grand Launch
description: SafeScore officially launched with its first public release of the data-driven prediction engine.

changes.title: Prediction Engine v1
changes.description: Launched a rule-based prediction system analyzing team form, league strength, match statistics, and head-to-head data to generate football predictions.

changes.title: League Coverage
changes.description: Initial support for Premier League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Ligue 1, and additional European leagues.

changes.title: Match Analytics
changes.description: Provided match-level insights including recent form, goals scored/conceded, league rankings, and historical H2H data.

changes.title: Dark UI Experience
changes.description: Released a clean black-and-white interface optimized for speed, readability, and mobile responsiveness.

changes.title: Performance Improvements
changes.description: Optimized prediction calculations and UI rendering for faster load times.

title: Beta Refinements
description: Final UX and stability improvements before public launch.

changes.title: UI Animations
changes.description: Added subtle entrance and scroll-based animations for a smoother experience.

changes.title: Responsive Layout
changes.description: Fixed layout and spacing issues on smaller screen sizes.
